text.text_translated:
More than 4,000 climbers went to the top of Everest.
They were from thirteen to eighty years old.
Climbing high mountains is very dangerous.
It is very cold and there are strong storms.
But the best climbers still look for new challenges.

Gerlinde Kaltenbrunner is from Austria.
She loved climbing mountains when she was a teenager.
She left school.
She worked as a nurse.
But she climbed in her free time.

The qualitative audit confirms appropriate A2 vocabulary and simple sentence structures, utilizing only A2-level connectors such as 'and', 'but', and 'when'.
